crawlPresets.title: Crawl Presets
crawlPresets.emptyHint: Save filter configurations as presets for quick re-execution
crawlPresets.name: Name
crawlPresets.searchHint: Free text search in source names
crawlPresets.noFavoritesHint: Mark presets as favorites for quick access
crawlPresets.deleteConfirm: Do you really want to delete the preset "{name}"?
crawlPresets.noFiltersConfigured: No filters configured - crawls all sources

info.overview: Crawl presets save filter configurations for recurring crawl tasks. This allows you to re-execute frequently used combinations of entity types, categories, tags, and source types with a single click.
info.overviewDetails: When executing a preset, all data sources matching the configured filters will be crawled. The number of matching sources is shown before execution.
info.editorDescription: Crawl presets let you save and reuse frequently used filter configurations. Define once which entities and sources should be crawled – then you can start the crawl anytime with a single click.
info.editorDetails: Filter options: Select entity types, categories, tags, source types, status, or use free text search. The preview shows how many sources match. For scheduled crawls, the current filter state is used at execution time – new matching sources are automatically included.
info.scheduleHint: Schedules use CRON expressions (server time: UTC). You will be notified if scheduled crawls fail.
info.previewHint: The preview shows currently matching sources. '0 sources' means no data sources match the selected filters.

crawlPresets.duplicateSuccess: Preset duplicated – you can now edit it

entitySelection.title: Entity Selection (Optional)
entitySelection.description: Optionally select specific entities. Only DataSources of these entities will be crawled.
entitySelection.noneHint: All DataSources of the category will be crawled, regardless of entities.
entitySelection.fixedHint: The selected entity IDs are stored. New entities will not be automatically included.
entitySelection.dynamicHint: Uses the entity filters above (entity type, tags). Current entities are determined on each execution.
